name: 11-oxo-beta-amyrin,[reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase (30-hydroxylating)
definition: 11-Oxo-beta-amyrin + Oxygen + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] <=> 30-Hydroxy-11-oxo-beta-amyrin + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
comment: the first step of three-step reaction (see R10316, R10313+R10314+R10315)
